Title: Relates to enrollment eligibility for federal, state and local court officials and their immediate families in the address confidentiality program
Summary: Permits enrollment eligibility for federal, state and local court officials and their immediate families in the address confidentiality program to protect judicial officers.
LawCode: Amd ยง108, Exec L; amd ยง216, Judy L; amd ยง5-508, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the judiciary law and the election law, in relation to address confidentiality to federal, state and local court officials and their immediate families
